Class orderSummaryController

java.lang.Object
orderSummaryController
public class orderSummaryController extends Object
Class responsible for displaying the order summary

This class is responsible displaying the ordes information such as the total price, and the drinks ordered, their price, and any modifications to the order.

  • Method Details

    • setTopping

      public void setTopping(String topping, String action)

      Set the toppings for the drink

      Parameters:
      topping - the drink toppings
      action - the action assoicated with the topping, i.e., "add", "sub", "remove"

    • setOrder

      public void setOrder(Order order)

      This method gets the current Order Object to ensure that the selected drink for this page is associated with the correct/current orde

      Parameters:
      order - the current Order Object that comes from the previous "page"

    • actionExitButtion

      public void actionExitButtion()
      Button action to return back to the main menu

      This method will switch back to the main menu scene.

    • loadDrinkOrder

      public void loadDrinkOrder()

      This method is creates a component that will contian the information for a drink ordered. It will list the specified sweetness level, ice level, and toppings for the drink. It will also amount of drink ordered, and the price associated on the card will assoicate to the quanity of the drink ordered times the price of the drink.

    • actionSubmitOrderButton

      public void actionSubmitOrderButton()

      This method will submit the full order to the database, editing the total price in the "order" table, since when the entity was initally inserted into the table, its total price was zero. All orders, customers, and drinks should be finalized and present in the database after this function. This function will also go back to the customer information scene.
